title.rendered: How to get your product into stores with Damon Meredith of Balletic

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 24:47 — 22.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 24:47 — 22.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Damon Meredith talks about the things we need to get our brands into stores. While Amazon is keyword-driven, retail is more impulse-driven that is why it’s important to create products that respond to the environment. Make sure your product innovative enough to get into stores.

You’ll Learn:

  • How to deal with Amazon driven products vs retail
  • Find out the costs for developing a serious brand that could be retail ready
  • How to access the right talent teams
  • The services they offer to E-commerce business owners
  • That you don’t need 500k to start
  • The standards you look for to make sure that you have cashflow
